main event: A military pilot reported observing a diamond-shaped, semitransparent, orange object during a flight on 26 December 1953.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be moving at speeds between 1000 to 1200 mph,The pilot was unable to overtake the object which maintained its straight and level course,The object left a trail behind it that was approximately 150 feet long,The pilot initially thought it was a reflection of the sun,The object's behavior suggested it was under intelligent control.
